website_summaries.verdict: Oversized watch face with a hint of glitz that is sure to grab attention. Rose gold color is stylish and looks great on any skin tone.
pros: Huge watch face at 36mm, and the oversized look is enhanced by the extremely thin watch band (10 mm)
We love how the tiny crystals that are embedded into the watch hands add a touch of bling
Rose gold color is trendy and pretty
cons: This exaggerated, oversized look will not appeal to everyone
Rare reports of the watch stopping after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: After just few wears, the crystals start falling off.. I am very disappointed. and I cant even return it now.. I wish I bought it from store., at least I could complain there and maybe get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Irisha Gov

customer_reviews.title: Get this watch for your gf or as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting this because I wasn't sure if it was going to be too flashy with the band set up the way it is. However, it's super small and fits my gf's wrist perfectly. She loved the watch a lot and wears it when we go out on the weekends. You can also easily adjust the band itself by taking out links which is great. No tool required. If you're not sure if you want this watch as a gift, do yourself a solid and just buy it. Well worth the $ and looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is perfect for dressing up. Sparkly and Michael Kors developed a band that allows easy snap off links for those of us with small wrists. Every link can be snapped off! Great watch. Can’t wait to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Not enough links
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful but too short (a little tight-circulation) so, I've written the company asking to send an additional link-or-2, but they've not responded back - so sadly I've had to return the watch :(
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Felton-Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. Its so simple and timeless (no pun intended) and goes with just about any outfit. I wear mostly rose gold jewelry and it looks great with that. Its nice and heavy and feels solid. I had too get a link removed so I went to a jewelry store and turns out you can easily remove them yourself! (I'm not too familiar with watches) so that's also a plus
customer_reviews.author: Serraya Brautigam

customer_reviews.title: Worn/Fake Watch
customer_reviews.text: The "MK" on the dial was worn out. Rather than being rose gold, the letters were black. I can't claim it's a "fake" but it seems like it. Otherwise, it is a beautiful watch. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Classic Chic
customer_reviews.text: This watch is the perfect combination of comfort and class. Great value and chic for the win. I love the elegance of it. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my best friend as a gift & she loves it!!! Beautiful watch !!! I had white too!

customer_reviews.title: Nice - but wouldn’t fit properly!!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the watch - but couldn’t adjust it to fit my wrist properly. Regretfully - had to return it!

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!

customer_reviews.title: A Definite Jewelry Piece!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, but mine stopped working after three months
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, but mine stopped working after three months. I thought it was a battery issue, so I just got a new battery and it worked for three hours and stopped again. Too bad I missed the return period.
